question.body: Based on the visual display that you produced for answering the previous question, does it seem like there is some evidence in the data in favor of the alternative hypothesis? Explain.

part.explanation: We notice that most of the differences (7 out of 11) are negative, indicating that in 7 of the 11 plots, the dry seeds produced more corn yield. This is evidence in favor of the alternative hypothesis, but the evidence is not overwhelming, so it is hard to say whether this is strong enough evidence to reject the null hypothesis in favor of the alternative.
